resources.string: You need to Sign in to Pc Links from your Google account. Then download Pc links chrome extension from Google web store (We have already sent you mail with extensions link on your registered mail address) .\nSign in to Chrome Extension from the same google account as provided in PcLink.

You need to Download the Pc link Chrome Extension from the given link 
 https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/pc-links/obglmabjiehobkpibcggmfmpefagefib 
(Open it in computer),which you will receive in your mail 
Then Sign in on chrome extension from same google account as you provided in PcLink.
Read our get started guided to setup your system \n You can later open help from navigation menu
Like this app \n rate us and share your thoughts
